Load libraries
```{r}
library(dplyr)
```


Load raw data
```{r}
# Read all raw data
path <- "data"
files = list.files(path = path, pattern="*.csv")
for (i in 1:length(files)){
  assign(files[i], read.csv(paste("data", files[i], sep = "/"), stringsAsFactors = F))
} 

# Merge all raw data
rawdata <- rbind(rawdata_Chang.csv, rawdata_Yujing.csv, rawdata_zhengdao.csv)
```
